record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Dr. Melanie Roberts, who is a fellow in my office; Mr. Kevin Eckerle, a fellow in the Commerce Committee; Dr. Steve Leherman, a fellow in Senator Pryor's office; and Mr. Craig Robinson, a fellow in Senator Lieberman's office, all be granted the privilege of the floor during the pendency of S. 761 and any votes that occur on this bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Jack Wells, a fellow on my staff, be granted floor privileges for the duration of the debate on S. 761, the America COMPETES Act.
